amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for immigration enforcement, detention and removal operations by $100 million. The increase would be offset by reducing funding for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management by the same amount.

action.text: Mr. Aderholt raised a point of order against the Poe (TX) amendment (A008). Mr. Aderholt stated that the amendment seeks to amend portions of the bill not yet read for consideration. The Chair sustained the point of order.
